name: Anthrodynia (O2A2 ver)
description:
Summary:

"Anthrodynia: From me, to you" is a short horror romance visual novel made for the O2A2: queer edition game jam, intended for 18+ audiences due to the content inside.  "Anthrodynia" was made in Ren'py through the span of a few days and comes to exactly 1,000 words. The player is non-customiseable and has no specific traits or attributes within this version.

Plot:

In "Anthrodynia" you play as an overworked employee, who takes the same route day-in, day-out to and from your place of work. You have little energy for your hobbies and life outside of work, which deeply affects your personal life.  Today is a day like many others, but in some ways less than most. 

Will you discover what gift this day has brought forth to you?

Content & Trigger warnings:
  • Stalking
  • Violence
  • Reference to drugs (in a single ending)
  • Blood (on certain parts of the GUI)

Please do not play "Anthrodynia" if the above may trigger you.

Credit(s):
  • Code & artwork by sleepyboydev
  • Music made by sleepyboydev using Bosca Ceoil (a program by Terry Cavanagh.)
  • SFX ('concrete footsteps 1') by patchytherat, found on Pixabay's sound section [license free to use for personal & commercial usage.]
  • Original BG image photograph (this has been heavily edited in the game) by Erkam Hayta on Pexels [100% free]
  • GUI font ('Alagard') by Hewett Tsoi, found on Dafont [100% free license.]
  • Game font ('Lilian') by jsr_Games, found on Dafont [100% free license.]

if you'd like to tip me, please use the ko-fi link on my profile!
